= Introduciton to the Principles of effective Technical Writing =
* Cannot be opiniated
* Not creative writing
* Should be factual only
* Clarity, Precision, 
* Hedge: Unclear
	* Hedging means taking both sides, thus taking no chances of absolute failure
	* "this might mean.."
	* "these findings might mean this"
	* demonstrate that you are only 50% correct

= Evaluation =
* Review Essay (group, assignment) 25% 
* Summary (individual, in class) 30%
* Poster (group, assignment) 25%
* Class Test (quiz)  20%
